import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import { getProductQuery, updateProductQuery } from '../queries' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; export default function EditProduct({ match }) { const id = (match.params.id) const { data, loading, error } = useQuery(getProductQuery, { variables: { id } }) if (loading) { return
Loading...
; } const [name, setName] = useState('') const [price, setPrice] = useState(0) const [category, setCategory] = useState('Health') const [shortDesc, setShortDesc] = useState('') const [description, setDescription] = useState('') if (error) { return
{`Error! ${error.message}`}
; } setName(data.product.name) setPrice(data.product.price) setCategory(data.product.category) setShortDesc(data.product.shortDesc) setDescription(data.product.description) //const [updateProduct] = useMutation(updateProductQuery); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() //updateProduct({ variables: { name, price: parseFloat(price), category, shortDesc, description } }) setName('') setPrice(0) setCategory('Health') setShortDesc('') setDescription('') } return (
{ setName(e.target.value) }} />
